name: Reactor (itch) (Mert Tuğkan Uluşal)
description:
Was made in Weekly Game Jam 176

Theme: Charge

Cores of the reactors are depleted. Now the robot needs to refill the cores and restart the reactor to keep the facility working.

WASD Movement

E to pick up and let go 

Unity Snaps was used in this project.

I made the music.

The voice is Google text to speech.
